ul.li: Karplus Strong — Modeling a plucked string in Max
Step Sequencer — Building a simple, polyphonic step sequencer
Vocoder — Frequency domain processing, robot sounds
Boomerang Pedal — Record and layer audio
TB-303 — One of the most popular pieces of musical hardware, realized (kind of) in Max
Pitch Shifting — Take a peek at how pitch shifting works, using variable-length delay lines
Circular Sequencer — A variation on the standard step sequencer, powered by Javascript
Bpatcher — Learn how to make a patch within a patch
Wobble Bass — This was a very topical tutorial, back in 2011
